content: So we have two perps now, an Israeli teenager and a copycat who was pissed off at his girlfriend. Neither are white supremacists. Neither appear to have been emboldened because of Trump. So all of the imagined cause-and-effect TP has written about, all of the anti-Trump innuendo and thinly veiled accusations TP has made these past months has been COMPLETELY without merit. Awesome. Keep those donations rolling in, folks!
